data.name: My Cute Succubus  - Girls in Hell 18+
data.detailed_description:
✟My Cute Succubus - Girls in Hell 18+✟ is for adults only! Be careful, the game becomes filled with love and hellish warmth! Cute Dictators included!

♥Features♥:

  • New GIRLS MODE.
  • 20 new levels with prisoners of Hell.
  • 3 new characters
  • New endings
  • Completely naked girls

data.short_description: ✟My Cute Succubus - Girls in Hell 18+✟ - unlocks additional content with new 20 levels and 3 new characters.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ Compatible Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2,28 Ghz or faste
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
Does not contain scenes of violence or sexual acts.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 21.
